snippet: The American Embassy called the imprisonment of Valery Ivashchenko, an ally of former Prime Minister Yulia V. Tymoshenko, politically motivated.
abstract: United States Embassy in Ukraine calls for the release of Valery Ivashchenko, ally of former prime minister Yulia V Tymoshenko, who was found guilty and sentenced to five years in prison for his role in the sale of a government-owned shipbuilding plant; Ivashchenko, who denies the charges, accuses Ukrainian authorities of pursuing a campaign of persecution against opponents of Pres Viktor F.Yanukovich.
lead_paragraph: The American Embassy called the imprisonment of Valery Ivashchenko, an ally of former Prime Minister Yulia V. Tymoshenko, politically motivated.

headline.seo: U.S. Condemns Prison Term for Ex-Defense Chief in Ukraine
headline.main: U.S. Condemns Prison Term for Ukraine’s Ex-Defense Chief
headline.print_headline: U.S. Condemns Prison Term for Ukraine’s Ex-Defense Chief
